{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Jogging {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Jogging Jogging is a form of trotting or running at a slow or leisurely pace. The main intention is to increase physical fitness with less stress on the body than from faster running but more than walking, or to maintain a steady speed for longer periods of time. Performed over long distances, it is a form of aerobic endurance training. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jogging)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
